definition: Donglan county in Hezhou 賀州|贺州[He4 zhou1], Guangxi
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
Donglan county in Hezhou 賀州|贺州[He4 zhou1], Guangxi

sentences.english: The college grew into what is now Michigan State University in East Lansing.
sentences.chinese: 這所學校發展成爲如今位於東蘭辛的密歇根州大學。

sentences.english: Donglan County is located in a poverty-stricken mountain area in northwest Guangxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 東蘭縣地處廣西西北部貧困山區。

sentences.english: Squatters awaiting resettlement ward off winter's chill around a bonfire in their camp in East Rand.
sentences.chinese: 東蘭德，等待重新安置的寮屋居民圍着篝火取暖。
